Literature.Title: Structure, interactions, and antibacterial activities of MSI-594 derived mutant peptide MSI-594F5A in lipopolysaccharide micelles: role of the helical hairpin conformation in outer-membrane permeabilization.
Literature.Author: Domadia PN, Bhunia A, Ramamoorthy A, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=15µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=45µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=8µM)
